languages.text: "Количество преступлений на нижних палубах увеличилось в пять раз. Серфы как с цепи сорвались".

traits.locale_text: "Количество преступлений на нижних палубах увеличилось в пять раз. Серфы как с цепи сорвались".

languages.text: "Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."
languages.original_text: "Количество преступлений на нижних палубах увеличилось в пять раз. Серфы как с цепи сорвались".

traits.locale_text: "The crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."
"The number of accidents on the lower decks has increased five times. Sabotage?"
"Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."
"The number of accidents on the lower decks has increased fivefold. Is it sabotage... or something else?"
"Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."
"The crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."
"Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."
"Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."

languages.text: « La criminalité sur les ponts inférieurs a été multipliée par cinq. À croire que les serfs sont devenus fous. »
languages.original_text: "Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."

traits.locale_text: « La criminalité sur les ponts inférieurs a été multipliée par cinq. À croire que les serfs sont devenus fous. »

languages.text: «El crimen de las cubiertas inferiores se ha multiplicado por cinco. Es como si los campesinos se hubieran vuelto locos».
languages.original_text: "Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."

traits.locale_text: «El crimen de las cubiertas inferiores se ha multiplicado por cinco. Es como si los campesinos se hubieran vuelto locos».

languages.text: “底层甲板的犯罪率猛增了五倍，所有人都像是患了失心疯一样。”
languages.original_text: "Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."

traits.locale_text: “底层甲板的犯罪率猛增了五倍，所有人都像是患了失心疯一样。”

languages.text: 「下層デッキでの犯罪が5倍に増えた。まるで農奴が狂ったように」
languages.original_text: "Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."

traits.locale_text: 「下層デッキでの犯罪が5倍に増えた。まるで農奴が狂ったように」

languages.text: Die Kriminalität auf den unteren Decks hat sich verfünffacht. Als hätten alle den Verstand verloren.
languages.original_text: "Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."

traits.locale_text: Die Kriminalität auf den unteren Decks hat sich verfünffacht. Als hätten alle den Verstand verloren.

languages.text: "Alt güvertelerdeki suç işlenme oranı beş kat arttı. Köleler, akıllarını kaybetmiş gibiler."
languages.original_text: "Crime on the lower decks has increased fivefold. It's like the serfs have gone mad."
